title: True or False & Fill in the Blanks
description: Mixed exercises with true/false and completion questions

questions.question: True or False: 'Chilly' means the weather is very hot.
True or False: If you are 'allergic to' cats, you can have one as a pet without problems.
I don't have ______ to do, I'm free all day.
She is a very ______ person, she loves to talk.
